nodes.text: Kalevala Spaceworks was a Mandalorian starship manufacturing company based on the planet Kalevala, located in the Outer Rim Territories' Mandalore sector. Kalevala Spaceworks constructed the luxury starliner known as the Coronet for Duchess Satine Kryze of the New Mandalorians, utilizing high quality materials from across Mandalorian space.

Kalevala Spaceworks was first introduced to Star Wars canon in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series reference book, Star Wars: The Clone Wars Official Episode Guide Series 1 & 2, authored by Jason Fry and published September 30, 2010. It was later mentioned in Fry's subsequent reference book for the television series, Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Incredible Vehicles, released a year later in 2011.
